name: Neutral Dark Gray for Ipernity, Part 2/2
description: Part two of the two-part Neutral Dark Gray style for the photo sharing site Ipernity. Not recommended to be used without part one. To use them both at the same time, just download and activate them both.
additional_info:
Part 2 includes:

– Articles
– Docs
– Groups
– Contacts
– Explore
– Mail
– Account settings
– Club
– Help/dev/about etc
– Organize
– Invite people
– Logging/signing
– Ipernity for anonymous user

Note that even though Explore What’s Hot column number is dynamic as well, it works slightly funny, because unlike other thumbnail views it is originally a table. Similar inconsistencies partly explain why the style had to be split in two parts.

Version 1.03 fixes bug where image caption failed to show in the main single image page.
